headline: Willis Towers Watson (WTW): Net Margin Drops to 1.4% as One-Off Loss Tests Bullish Narratives
summary: Willis Towers Watson (WTW) reported net profit margins of just 1.4% for the most recent period, a sharp drop from 11.2% a year ago, as the company took a one-off $1.6 billion loss as of September 30, 2025. Over the past five years, earnings have declined by 27.7% per year. Both future earnings and revenue are forecast to grow at 8.7% and 6.5% per year, falling short of the broader US market averages. Investors will be weighing these modest growth expectations and margin pressures against the...

headline: Willis Towers Watson Earnings Transcript
summary: Good morning, everyone, and thank you for joining us for Willis Towers Watson Public Limited Company's Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Call.  Joining me today is Andrew Krasner, our Chief Financial Officer.  Julie Gebauer, our President of Health, Wealth, and Career, and Lucy Clark, our President of Risk and Broking are also joining us for our Q&A session.
